name: Future Express Train - train drive ats light
name_original: Future Express Train - train drive ats light
description:
Future Express Train is a train game in the future. It's one of its kind among space games. Get on board your train – either a diesel or electric train – speed along, and solve various tasks. Stop at a railway station or transport cargo in the space. This game offers breathtaking views, magnificent engines and carriages. It's perfect for everyone who loves trains. Your child will most definitely want to play this game.

There's a series of complicated tasks ahead of you. Tank up your train at a gas station and speed up, engine driver.
